Reviews.Title: “Good location, but ........!!!”

Reviews.Content: hotel located noisy makes sleeping convenient appreciable city hotel styles lucky friends bad found towel hole thank god clean phone device phone couldnt call receive calls finally called reception coming repair phone

Reviews.Title: “Good Location, it is 3* rather than 4*”
Reviews.Author: SofiaGeorgia
Reviews.Content: friends visited hotel santa pera 4 nights booked 3 triple hotel staff helpful helped organize transfer hotel located 200 istiklal street shops cafes hotel bathrooms clean breakfast hotel 3 4 recommend budget travelers students people prefer location comfort

Reviews.Title: “Like a horror movie!”
Reviews.Author: ma8el
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights january 2012 repairing hotel means couldnt rest short noise outside time inside secondly bathrooms awful dirty cold dont explain imagine worst bathroom seen located 2 floor couldnt shower scum cold fair staff tried help hearing complaints change telling means worst step found behaviour bit tricky breakfasts spectacular sum dont recommend hotel easily nicer hotels taksim price 50 euros night turkish feel shame hotel feel sorry reputation

Reviews.Title: “Pay more and get a good hotel, avoid this one.”
Reviews.Author: jaye321
Reviews.Content: hotel smells sewage overlooks 8 lane motorway noisy 24h difficult sleep staff friendly speak basic english breakfast western continental turkish olives potatoes raisins soup tv turkish channels hotel website free transfer service tried book hung phone receptionist service website advise travellers pay money chain western ruin vacation hotels grade taxim pretty european 4 star hotel please bear mind 2 star budget hotel stuff ahead book

Reviews.Title: “Pay more and go to another hotel”
Reviews.Author: gsijim
Reviews.Content: stayed days wasnt pleasant reservation wasnt ready bed realized alli talked reception informed blankets wet previous night breakfast simple recommended

Reviews.Title: “For 3* prizes 4* quality”

Reviews.Content: friendly hotel look solutions hotel directly speaking english able fix wifi double glass view santa express nearly renovated skyline minarets topkapi dont beyoglu 5 minuts walking taxi pera busses al directions bosporus walk road 24hours roomservice airco cleaning towels refreshed daily bathroom bed cleaned everyday
